\medhead{\idx{Salve Regina}}

\smallskip

\setgregorian1
\setclef14
\musicindent14mm
\raisesong3\Internote
\initiumgregorianum
\musicinitial{V.}{S}%
%%%Salve Regina
\sgn {}Al\punctum J\egn
\sgn ve,\punctum L\egn
\spatium
\sgn Reg\engl{\idx{Hail, holy Queen}}\punctum N\egn
\sgn {}{\'\i}n\punctum a\egn
\sgn {}a,\punctum N\augmentum N\egn
\spatium
\asteriscus

\sgn {}er\punctum c\egn
\spatium

\Finisgregoriana

%\bigskip

%\s V. Ora pro n\'obis, s\'ancta D\'ei G\'enitrix.

%{\hskip10mm \it Pray for us, O holy Mother of God.}

%\s R. Ut d\'\i gni effici\'amur promissi\'onibus Chr\'\i sti.

%{\hskip10mm \it That we may be made worthy of the promises of Christ.}
